iq-questions.name: IQ Questions
iq-questions.description: Challenge your mind with timed IQ questions, instant feedback, and detailed explanations designed for learners of all levels.

card_matching.name: Card Matching
card_matching.description: Train your memory with a relaxing card matching experience featuring smooth animations, gentle audio, and progressive difficulty modes.

AI-npc.name: AI NPC
AI-npc.description: Interact with intelligent AI-powered non-player characters in an immersive virtual environment. Experience dynamic conversations and realistic AI behavior in this cutting-edge VR/AR application.
